snippet.title: WarForwards: John Wick-Inspired Top-Down Shooter Action with Over 70 Weapons
snippet.description:
Join the fight in WarForwards, the top-down shooter inspired by John Wick. Engage in intense 2D gun battles and dynamic combat. Play now and experience the thrill of close-quarters combat. Enter the world of WarForwards and become a master of the gun.

🎁Wishlist today so you don't miss the next sale!
Epic Games Store➡️https://bit.ly/WarForwards-EpicGamesStore
Steam➡️https://bit.ly/WarForwards-Steam
GOG➡️https://bit.ly/WarForwards-GOG

Enter the world of WarForwards, a unique military academy where cadets train for combat. Join forces with friends, equip your gear, and battle your way to victory through enemy ranks in various locations. Dominate the battlefield with precise shooting and intense close-quarters combat. Show them who's the best and emerge victorious in WarForwards.

In this intense, action-packed game, you'll face off against dozens of enemies armed with a massive arsenal of weapons. Master your skills and tactics to overcome the odds and emerge victorious. Whether you're fighting in the story-driven campaign or battling for survival in endless mode, WarForwards offers endless challenges and non-stop action. Play now and become a master of the battlefield.

Featuring: 
✅Intense 2D gun battles and dynamic combat
✅Inspired by the hit movie John Wick
✅Close-quarters combat in a top-down shooter format
✅Critical shot mechanics for maximum damage
✅Thrilling story-driven campaign and endless survival mode
✅Over 70 weapons to unlock and customize with the perk system
✅Non-stop action and endless challenges

➡️ https://meridian4.com/
➡️ https://www.tiktok.com/@meridian4.games 
➡️ https://discord.com/invite/adMSaZK32K
➡️ https://twitter.com/Meridian4
➡️ https://www.instagram.com/meridian_4/
➡️ https://www.youtube.com/c/Meridian4
➡️ https://www.facebook.com/Meridian4

#johnwick #indiegame #topdownshooter
